channel.title: [PI] Dungeoneering Help
channel.description:
Okay, so I recently attempted adding dungeoneering to my PI server using this tutorial here: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/314787-pi-messy-dungeoneering-need-634-items-602-npcs-508-maps.html
After finishing the tutorial and compiling with no errors I decided to test everything out. First off, when I talk to Thok, nothing happens. I want to make it so that He takes you into the dungeoneering area and so that the public void WriteDungeoneeringQuestTab and everything come up and start working.
Second of all, the location of the NPCS spawned is nothing but black space, I'm guessing because I don't have the mapdata required to complete the tutorial I listed. How can I made it so I change the location of the NPCs I spawned into a different place or find the proper mapdata?
Any help with either of these problems is MUCH appreciated.

item.title: [PI] Dungeoneering Help
item.dc:creator: @k1ng0frs k1ng0frs
item.description:
@k1ng0frs wrote:

uh some1 esle make a dung mini-game in the tutorial sections of the forums you can use that.
or you can post your error on here so some1 can help you

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Dungeoneering Help
item.dc:creator: @tztk tztk
item.description:
@tztk wrote:

Okay, so I recently attempted adding dungeoneering to my PI server using this tutorial here: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/314787-pi-messy-dungeoneering-need-634-items-602-npcs-508-maps.html

After finishing the tutorial and compiling with no errors I decided to test everything out. First off, when I talk to Thok, nothing happens. I want to make it so that He takes you into the dungeoneering area and so that the public void WriteDungeoneeringQuestTab and everything come up and start working.

Second of all, the location of the NPCS spawned is nothing but black space, I’m guessing because I don’t have the mapdata required to complete the tutorial I listed. How can I made it so I change the location of the NPCs I spawned into a different place or find the proper mapdata?

Any help with either of these problems is MUCH appreciated.

Read full topic
